text: Ihudidera jan'ye ami pratyeka nakhabisista jantu harama karechilama ebam chagala o garu theke etadubhayera carbi ami tadera jan'ye harama karechilama, kintu ai carbi, ya prste kimba antre sanyukta thake athaba asthira sathe milita thake. Tadera abadhyatara karane ami taderake e sasti diyechilama. Ara ami abasya'i satyabadi.
